summary: A two handed great axe that deals poison damage
descriptionHtml: A two handed great axe Ive been working on still not toatally satisfied with so might make another version down the road. Anyways it can be smithed with the ebony smithing perk or you can just add it via the console by typing in "help" poison then you should see an ID for poison axe then type in player.additem thecode then goes here 1 and it will be added to your inventory. Feedback and suggestions for new weapon mods are always welcome hope you enjoy :]
author: wootwoot55
